Navigation

Source: src/objects/navigation/navigation

The Navigation object is a pattern that appears across all pages of Generation NYC, allowing the navigation to different pages. The navigation contains elements such as icons, links, dropdowns.

Demonstration

Generation NYCNYC’s Official Guide for
Young New Yorkers
TopicsInspirationsOpportunitiesTrips
Generation NYCNYC’s Official Guide for
Young New Yorkers
TopicsInspirationsTrips

Markup

<nav class="o-navigation bg-black text-white">
  <div class="flex items-end"><a class="o-navigation-logo text-white"
      href="/"><span class="sr-only">Generation NYC</span><svg
        aria-hidden="true" class="logo">
        <use xlink:href="#pttrn-logo-gen"></use>
      </svg></a><span class="o-navigation__text text-white">NYC’s Official Guide
      for<br>Young New Yorkers</br></span></div>
  <div
    class="o-navigation-items hidden tablet:grid grid-rows-2 text-right items-end">
    <div class="select__container text-right text-white pb-2 pr-4"><label
        class="select__label" for="language">Translate</label><select
        class="select text-white border-white" id="language" name="language">
        <option value="en">English</option>
        <option value="ar">Arabic</option>
        <option value="bn">Bengali</option>
        <option value="fr">French</option>
        <option value="ht">Haitian Creole</option>
        <option value="ko">Korean</option>
        <option value="pl">Polish</option>
        <option value="ru">Russian</option>
        <option value="es">Spanish</option>
        <option value="zh-hant">Traditional Chinese</option>
        <option value="ur">Urdu</option>
      </select><svg aria-hidden="true" class="select__icon icon-xs">
        <use xlink:href="#pttrn-icon-chevron-down"></use>
      </svg></div>
    <div class="o-navigation-links tablet:pt-6"><a
        class="hidden tablet:inline o-navigation-link" href="#">Topics</a><a
        class="hidden tablet:inline o-navigation-link"
        href="#">Inspirations</a><a
        class="hidden tablet:inline o-navigation-link"
        href="#">Opportunities</a><a
        class="hidden tablet:inline o-navigation-link" href="#">Trips</a><a
        class="hidden tablet:inline o-navigation-link" href="#"><svg
          aria-hidden="true" class="select__icon icon-sm text-white">
          <use xlink:href="#pttrn-icon-search"></use>
        </svg></a></div>
  </div><button aria-controls="toggle-mobile-menu"
    class="btn--secondary tablet:hidden"
    data-js="navigation"><span>Menu</span></button>
</nav>
<aside aria-hidden="true"
  class="o-navigation-mobile bg-gradient-y-1 hidden tablet:hidden"
  id="toggle-mobile-menu">

        data-js="navigation"><span>Close</span></button></div>
  </div>
